entry.title: Crown Shaving Lip Repair
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Men's Skincare
Price: 11.37

We formulated this natural lip balm with a hydrating blend of beeswax, jojoba oil and Shea butter to restore, repair and moisturize dry, chapped lips. It’s easy to carry for those ski trips, too.

Ingredients: Cera alba (beeswax), butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, ricinus communis (castor) seed oil, theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, menthe piperita tocopherol.

Description: Natural Lip Balm formulated with a hydrating blend of ingredients to restore, repair and provide daily moisture to dry/chapped lips.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Structure Styling Paste 120 ml/ 4 fl oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 14.00

A pliable styling paste that delivers a strong hold with a matte natural finish. Great for definition and structure. Sulfate and paraben free.

Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Lanolin Wax, Beeswax, PVP, PEG-8 Beeswax, Lanolin Alcohol, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Parfum/Fragrance, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Trideceth-10, Tridecyl Stearate, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Phenoxyethanol, Triethylene Glycol.

Directions: Apply and work through damp or dry hair and style as desired.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Hair Grooming Spray 225 mL/ 8 fl oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 14.00

This lightweight spray is as versatile as it gets; Use it as a pre-styling agent—just before blow drying—for added volume. It also adds pliable texture when worked through dry hair.

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Ethanol, VP/VA Copolymer, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Glycerin, Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract, Propanediol, PVP, Panthenol, Butylene Glycol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Melia Azadirachta (Leaf) Extract, Fragrance/Parfum, Polysorbate 20.

Directions: For added volume and texture, spritz evenly onto damp hair directly to the root area and proceed to blow dry and style into place. As a finishing spray, spritz evenly onto dry hair and style into place with hair comb or fingers. Provides a firm pliable low shine hold that wont flake, and cab be reactivated and restyled as needed throughout the day by adding water.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Aluminum-Free Deodorant 2.65 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Solid Cologne
Price: 14.00

Give bad odours a round house kick with our all-day deodorant. We can't promise you won't break a sweat doing it, but rest assured your pits won't itch seeing as it's aluminum and alcohol-free. It's also fragranced with our famous signature scent and small enough to get through customs. 

Ingredients: Tapioca Starch, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Ozokerite wax, Sodium bicarbonate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Fragrance, Tocopheryl acetate.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Beard Comb
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Beard Combs
Price: 12.00

Our custom-made, double-sided beard comb comes with a pocket sleeve for easy storage. Remember—the wide teeth help with combing longer hair, while the fine teeth suit shorter hair.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Matte Styling Clay - 4 Ounce Jar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 14.00

Ingredients: Petrolatum, Bentonite, Beeswax, Dicaprylyl, Maleate, Isopropyl Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Oleth-20, Glycerin, PVP/VA Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Parfum/Frangrance, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin

Description:

Want a hold as tough as what is offered with the Hippie Killer pomade, but would rather have a more understated finish? Crown Shaving's got you covered with this matte styling clay. Rich in minerals, this bentonite clay nourishes the hair while keeping it looking dapper.

Directions:

A small dime-sized amount of the clay on your palm is all you need. Wet the clay in your palm with a small amount of water, then spread through your hair with a comb.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Soothing After Shave Lotion
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 12.00

Ingredients: Aqua, Aloe barbadensis gel, Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) seed oil, Hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel) extract, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexylglycerin, Allantoin, Tocopherol, Polysorbate 80, Triethanolamine, Melia azadirichata leaf extract, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Acrylates/C10-C30 alkyl acryl ate cross polymer, Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Titanium dioxide, Citrus bergamia (bergamot) essential oil

Description:

Do you like an aftershave you can feel deep in your pores and can actually feel the freshness emanating from your cheeks and neck? Crown Shaving's aftershave lotion will give you that as well as treat your skin to a healthy array of nourishing ingredients.

Directions: 

Utilize a fractionally small amount between your palms and slowly apply it to the area you have just shaved. Stop usage if it hurts

entry.title: Crown Shaving Beard Balm - 4 Ounce Bottle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Beard Care
Price: 12.00

Ingredients: Purified water (aqua), aloe barbadensis gel, olea europaea (olive) oil, citrus bergamia (bergamot) oil, lavendula angustifiola (organic lavender) distillate, citris uranium (orange blossom) neroli distillate, Shea butter (naturally refined) vegetable glycerin, Isopropyl myristate, phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin, tochopheryl acetate, tochopherol (vitamin E), polysorbate 80, carbomer, disodium EDTA

Description: For the bearded gent looking to give his beard a smooth silky feel and a lustrous sheen, the Crown Shaving beard balm was crafted to deliver both style and comfort.

Directions: Just dab a small amount of the beard balm into your palms and thoroughly run through with your fingers.

entry.title: Crown Shaving After Shave Tonic - 4 Ounce Bottle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 15.00

Ingredients: Denatured alcohol, purified water (aqua), parfum, polysorbate 20, Hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel) distillate, Glycerin, Azadirachta (Neem) oil, pimento racemosa (bay rum) essential oil, bergamia (bergamot) essential oil, pimpinella anisum (anise seed) essential oil

Description:

One of the best tonics to emerge on the scene, Crown Shaving's post shave formulation soothes the skin while adding subtle hints of of tobacco, leather essence, rum and barber's talc powder to your scent.

Direction:

Apply the tonic to your palms and massage into your skin - be sure to keep the tonic away from your eyes at all times.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Peppermint Tea Tree Hair & Body Wash 16oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Men's Bodycare
Price: 17.00

Ingredients: Aqua, Aloe barbadensis gel, Sodium laureth sulfoacetate & Soidum laureth sulfosuccinate, Cocoamidopropyl betaine, Cocamide DIPA, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Polyquaternium-10, Camellia sinsensis (White tea) leaf extract, Glycyrrhiza glabra (Licorice) root extract, Hedychium coronarium (White ginger) root extract, Olea europaea (Olive) leaf extract, Pinus pinaster (Maritime pine) bark extract, Punica granatum (Pomegranate) extract, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) leaf extract, Theobroma cacao (Cocoa) extract, Vitis vinifera (Grape) seed extract, Bis-PEG-8 dimethicone, Mentha piperita (Peppermint) oil, Melaleuca alternifolia (Tea tree) leaf oil, Cyamopsis tetragonoloba (Guar) gum, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric acid, Sodium Chloride

Description:

Wash your hair then soap up your body? Who's got the time? This combination shampoo and body wash was developed to give both your hair and skin a deep, nourishing clean that well start your day (or end it) with an invigorating sense of refreshment.

Directions:

Simply lather up in the shower and apply to body and hair. Be sure to rinse thoroughly.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Co. Shave Cream - 4 Ounce Jar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Shave Creams
Price: 12.00

Ingredients: Aqua, Myristic acid, Stearic acid, Glycerin, Potassium hydroxide, Camellia sinensis (White tea) leaf extract, Glycyrrhiza glabra (Licorice) root extract, Hedychium coronarium (White ginger) root extract, Olea europaea (Olive) leaf extract, Pinus pinaster (Maritime pine) bark extract, Punica granatum (Pomegranate) extract, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) leaf extract, Theobroma cacao (Cocoa) extract Vitus vinifra (Grape) seed extract, Tocopheryl acetate, Retinyl palmitate, Methyl gluceth-20, Butyrospermum parkii (Shea butter), Aloe barbadensis leaf juice, Polyquaternium-7, Eucalyptus globulus leaf extract, Mentha viridis (Spearmint) leaf oil, Tocopherol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tetrasodium EDTA

Description: Packed with all the natural ingredients your skin could need to remain healthy and vital, this thick, rich shave cream will help deliver one of the smoothest shaves you'll experience in a while.

Directions: A little goes a long way. Apply until you have a nice thick lather, then proceed with your shave.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Hippie Killer Styling Pomade 4oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 12.00

Ingredients: Aqua, Cetearth-20, Sorbitol, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Caster Oil, Glycerin, Dimethicone Copolyol, Caprylyl Glycol & Caprylhydroxamic Acid & Glycerin, Parfum(fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol, Bee Propolis Extract, Hydrolized Wheat Protein & Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Starch

Description: A serious pomade for men who are serious about getting the hold they expect when styling their hair. All it takes is a tiny dab of this pomade to last you from morning to night (or the other way around, depending on how you spend your days). If the wind messes things up, it only takes a few drops of water to set things right again.

*No hippies were harmed in the production of this pomade.

Directions: Apply a dime-sized amount of the pomade into your palm, run a tiny amount of water over that palm, then sweep through your hair, and apply evenly with a comb.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Roll-On Cologne - 10ml Roller
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Colognes
Price: 10.00

Ingredients: Denatured alcohol, purified water (aqua), parfum, polysorbate 20, Hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel) distillate, Glycerin, Azadirachta (Neem) oil, pimento racemosa (bay rum) essential oil, bergamia (bergamot) essential oil, pimpinella anisum (anise seed) essential oil

Description: Created for the man who likes to leave the house with a masculine scent, this cologne features notes of tobacco, leather, anise and bay rum.

Directions: Apply a small dab to your preferred area.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Beard Wash - 8 Ounce Bottle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Beard Care
Price: 12.00

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacete, Lauryl Methyl Gluceth-10 Hydroxypropyldimonium Chloride, Dicaprylyl Ether, Decyl Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Panthenol, Aloe Baradensis Leaf Juice, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, glycerin, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Pinus Pinaster Bark/bud Extract, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Hedychium Coronarium root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Rosamarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride Acid

Description:

Beards can make a great compliment to your personal style, but he maintenance of the man mane can sometimes be a little demanding. The Crown Shaving beard wash was designed with a mission: to make sure no man ever considers shaving off his beard out of frustration.

What you can expect: the deepest, most refreshing wash - and your skin will thank you for the nutrient-rich formulation.

Directions:

Massage into your beard while showering and rinse thoroughly.

entry.title: Crown Shaving Supreme Glide Pre-Shave Formula
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Shaving
Type: Shave Creams
Price: 15.00

Ingredients: Aloe barbadensis (Organic Aloe) Juice, Limanthes alba (Meadowfoam) Seem, Vaccinium myrtillus (Organic Bilberry) Extract, Saccharum officianarum (Organic Sugar Cane) Extract, Acer saccharinum (Organic Sugar Maple) Extract, Citrus auranium dulcis (Organic Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus medica limonum (Organic Lemon) Extract, Vaccinium macrocarpon (Organic Cranberry) Extract. Essential Oils Phenoxyethanol, Hamamelis virginiana (Witch hazel) Kosher Vegetable Glycerin, Carbomer, TEA. Tetrasodiym EDTA, Citric Acid

Description: 

Finally, a pre-shave formula that doesn't leave your skin feeling oily. Packed with rich botanical extracts, Crown Shaving's pre-shave formula was conceived with the idea of adding even more skin-friendly elements to your morning ritual.

Directions:

Apply to moist skin a few minutes prior to shaving.
